definition: Tour de France cycle race/abbr. for 環法自行車賽|环法自行车赛
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

pinyin: Huan2 Fa3 Zi4 xing2 che1 sai4

sentences.english: The first leg of the Tour de France bicycle race began on the French island of Corsica today.
sentences.chinese: 今天，环法自行车比赛第一赛段从法属科西嘉岛开始。

sentences.english: But now sponsors and advertisers are growing wary of association with a sport riven with drug abuse.
sentences.chinese: 现在赞助商和广告主终于对环法的药物滥用发难了。

sentences.english: Said Valverde, who finished ninth overall in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 最终在巴黎获得环法总排位第九的巴尔维德说。

sentences.english: The main question for me on this Tour is when it will be fit for me to quit.
sentences.chinese: 我在这次环法大赛的主要问题是何时退出比赛最合适。

pinyin: Huan2 Fa3 Zi4 xing2 che1 sai4

definition: race of several days/many day competition
Cavendish (name)/Henry Cavendish (1731-1810), English nobleman and pioneer experimental scientist
